Bit Rate's Stage.title: Tails of Equestria: My Little Pony RPG!
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Question and answers about the My Little Pony RPG by River Horse

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Radio Brony - Running the first French Brony webradio
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Radio Brony was launched in 2012 and has since been running day and night with pony, brony and anything-closely-related-to-MLP music… plus our own live or recorded shows. But how did we do it and what happens in the backstage? That's what Kody and Starshine Bomber, director of the station and longest animator respectively, will be talking about.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: MelodicPony memorial project
Bit Rate's Stage.description: MelodicPony was brony musician making popular symphonic music in early days of fandom. But sadly, he passed away in December 2014. In order to honor his memory, a couple of people decided to hire a professional orchestra to play and record his music. There are plenty new things happening with the project behind the scenes, and I would like to give you updates on it.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: PrinceWhateverer
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Heyo! I'm PrinceWhateverer! Been making MLP fandom tunes since 2011 and now we have G5, there's no end in sight! If you want loud, intense ENERGY then I'm your horse! <3

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Imalou Panel
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Come meet Imalou, the character designer of many of our favorite new G5 friends! We'll be talking about art, Five Guys, and more!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Critical Foal CG RPG
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists: Eli, Thoth, Pirate Dash, Nora Mermaid
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Join Eliwood Sain and his insane crew of gamers, including the RiffPonies, Pirate Dash and a certain exuberant Fan-mermaid, as they go on another journey around Equestria with some fun new characters on adventure sure to be a lot of fuf.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: After the Fact: A New Generation!
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Silver Quill takes a look into the newest movie that introduced us to Equestria's future. Come compare your thoughts to his as we consider the good, the bad, and the bunnies! Expect Silver's mix of insight and ridiculousness in equal measure.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Twilight Sparkle's Secret Shipfic Folder: ONLINE
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Secret Shipfic is a popular mlp card game often played at cons. With everything going online during the pandemic, so too did shipfic. Hear from the solo developer the history of the tsssf.net project, some of the technical challenges, + more. There might even be a shipfic game held after the panel is over.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Riffing Rainbow 553: The Final Cut
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists: Thoth, Acesential, Forward Progress, Argembarger, Kevin
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Could this be the final chapter of an online pony con legacy?  We can only hope.  Join the RiffPonies & a crew of very special guest stars as they once again traverse horrifying pieces of My Little Pony fanfiction spun from the twisted web that is the mind of famous "the spiderses" fanfic writer Argembarger!  Buckle-down those brain cells & get read for another wild literary ride through the world of weird Pony fanfiction!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Drawing4Exposure
Bit Rate's Stage.description: A panel of starving artists. A bloodthirsty crowd. Free requests... MidnightPremiere and the Dootz Crew challenge the audience in a desperate battle of wills!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Convention Stories
Bit Rate's Stage.description: We have all been very fortunate to have some amazing conventions over the years! One of the greatest parts of this reality is all of the wonderful stories we have been able to make over the years. Come join some convention veterans as they share a handful of the tales from over the last decade of pony cons!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Equestria's Next Top Artist!
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists: Riffponies, Forward Progress, TechyCutie, BajaGryphon, Ruef, InkyNotebook, MidnightPremiere
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Art is subjective...unless you're drawing ponies, of course! Join the RiffPonies crew and a true color wheel-worthy assortment of special community guests as some of your favorite My Little Pony fan-artists clash for artistic supremacy in a gauntlet of artwork-based party games...with YOU as the judge! Help decide who truly is "Equestria's NEXT Top Artist" in a Pony art live-stream unlike any other!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: MathematicPony
Bit Rate's Stage.description: MathematicPony has been producing music in the fandom since 2015, trying on many genres along the way – much like one tries on pants. She's best known in the pony fandom for her songs Just Waiting, Destiny, and Dealbreaker.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: Khaliber
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Hailing from Virginia, The Producer/DJ Khaliber has been making a name for himself in online brony conventions since his Ponies At Dawn's debut with "Beyond". Since then, He's been on an online-convention warpath, performing at almost every major online brony convention in 2021, bringing a wide array of genres to the table for many to enjoy. Not to mention his insane mashups and audio visuals. However, he is not only known for his performances. Khaliber has also continued to release more music in 2021. He would release an Official Remix for Silva Hound's Helluva boss-inspired track, "Root Of All Evil." Then he would team up with Glimm & DJ SkyStorm to release the first ever G5-inspired track, "Izzy Pop," along with his EP, "Dreams," collaborating with artists such as: NeverLastStanding and Silva Hound.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: Nevermourn
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Nevermourn is a drum and bass producer and a writer for Horse Music Herald. A regular on the A State of Sugar compilation albums, and a few Ponies at Dawn albums. He is known mainly for his drum and bass music, but he's no stranger to pushing the boundary on genres of music.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: Bolt the Super-Pony
Bit Rate's Stage.description: When not contemplating the meaning of life, Bolt DJs on PonyvilleFM where his show Music is Timeless (Fridays @ 9 PM PDT), has been introducing Pony fans to great new music and old classics. Bolt even ran a request show on the Pony MMO Legends of Equestria! Outside of the airwaves Bolt is active in the fandom as well, continuing to volunteer and perform at conventions and parties across the west coast. Bolt loves the show and everything it stands for as well as the My Little Pony community. In his spare time, he can be found enjoying Pony content (and memes) on EqD, Derpibooru, and Twitter (where you can follow him @SuperPonyBolt!), as well as spending time with his friends.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: Prowox
Bit Rate's Stage.description: One of the few Bronies left in Finland who didn’t move on to the Anime- or Furry Fandom. In 2020 he both picked up DJing, performing at various online events, and co-founded an online pony music festival, both with the goal of spreading the magic of our fandom's music to anyone and everyone that is willing to listen. You can expect to hear either a set filled with Drum and Bass or a set going through various electronic genres, usually getting faster as it goes on.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: Rock Fox
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Rock Fox is a dance music DJ hailing from the sunny shores of Sydney, Australia. As a long time resident on PonyvilleFM, they bring a sound honed by a deep love and respect of the fandoms history

Neural Net's Stage.title: The Lessons of Friendship
Neural Net's Stage.description: Over the 9 seasons of Friendship is Magic there were a lot of Friendship Lessons so what did we really learn about Friendship and solving Friendship problems? In this panel I intend to discuss the main lessons that we learned about Friendship that were repeated throughout the course of the show.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Playing with Lasers with My Little Ties
Neural Net's Stage.description: Laser etching ponies onto various metal things! From tiny silver books, to colorful titanium dog tags, and more!

Neural Net's Stage.title: More Horse, More Friendship
Neural Net's Stage.panelists: Forward Progress, Baja Gryphon, Bolt the Super Pony, Thoth Penswel, Nova Rose
Neural Net's Stage.description: The magic of friendship has continued to grow outside of Equestria. Shows like Centaurworld have taken the concept of equine friendship and explored it in new ways. Join our panel of Brony personalities as we discuss the future of friendship and horses in animation and possibly grab some Giggle Cakes on the way!

Neural Net's Stage.title: Keeping Friendship Magic: Generations
Neural Net's Stage.description: A new generation of MLP is upon us and with it comes a host of questions about where the fandom goes from here. Combining real world social science with the ponies we all know and love, Keeping Friendship Magic takes a look at the evolution of fandoms, how our brains process new information, and the inherent stress of change to explore the prospect of a continued future through pony.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Why Did Friendship is Magic Do So Well?
Neural Net's Stage.description: 9 seasons, a spin off series, multiple specials and even a full length movie. Most kid shows would dream of having a run like this but most don’t make it past 1 season much less 9! In this Panel I will discuss why a show about the Friendship of 6 little candy colored Ponies was so successful.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Pony the Interruption
Neural Net's Stage.description: Based on the ESPN show “Pardon the Interruption,” the audience decides what we discuss! Drawing from old cards from previous runs of this panel over the years, we will take turns drawing at random of all sorts of horse subjects to discuss. Once we select a subject, we set a timer for three minutes and spend that time discussing the topic. Once the timer goes off, we stop and draw again. Lather, rinse, repeat!

Neural Net's Stage.title: Minty's Fan Animation Workshop
Neural Net's Stage.description: Join Minty Root in a look behind the scenes of the world of fan animation!
